review: Dr.Vikarm is very Efficient , humble and very experienced doctor.He never prescribed too meny medicine unless needed I'm consulting him for my son and I'm completely trust him in terms of diagnosis, medicine prescription.

An extremely patient paediatrician who explains in great detail. He has a special connect with children and is extremely professional when it comes to bedside manner. Extremely humble despite being highly qualified.
He listens problems attentively and gives sufficient treatment time. Never remains in hurry to catch next patient. Nice doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Vikram has been very friendly and caring and self information of Baby plan was shared for best of Babar growth. Would recommend to newborn for the visit. Thanks & Regards
